name: cucumber-guide
description: Cucumber with Nodejs 1. install yeoman with "npm install -g yo" 2. install cucumber generator with "npm install -g generator-cucumber generator-cucumber-step-definitions" 3. create project folder  4. go to project folder 5. new terminal or command prompt and go to your project folder and run "yo cucumber" 6. create package.json with "npm init --yes" 6. install dependency with "npm install zombie cucumber --save-dev" 7. in package.json find "test" keyword and replace value with "cucumber-js" 8. run "npm test" in terminal or command prompt.      if you error you can generate sample.steps.js with "yo cucumber-step-definitions" and you defind path of feature file for generated.
